mapper.insert: insert into product(product_id, product_category, product_name, product_brand, product_size, product_color, product_price, discount_rate, product_stock, product_image, product_detail) values(SEQ_PRODUCT.nextval, #{product_category}, #{product_name}, #{product_brand}, #{product_size}, #{product_color}, #{product_price}, #{discount_rate}, #{product_stock}, #{product_image}, #{product_detail})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from product where 1=1
and product_category like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and product_name like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'

select * from ( select p.*, row_number() over(order by product_id desc) as rnum from (select * from product p join category c on p.product_category = c.category_code) p where 1=1
and product_category like '%'||#{product.searchKeyword}||'%'
and product_name like '%'||#{product.searchKeyword}||'%'
) where rnum > ((#{block.pageNum}-1) * #{block.amount}) and rnum <= #{block.pageNum} * #{block.amount} order by product_id desc
